channel.title: Manetheren has 5 open spots
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Manetheren has 5 open spots"

item.title: Manetheren has 5 open spots
item.content:encoded:
This is what I offer:

*We are a Tier 3 Immortal Realm with almost all Upgrades. (today it's 149 I believe)

*We are summoning kaiju every single day, and we switch between Majors and Minor kaijus (1 major - 2 minors - 1 major - 2 minors aso), and Terri 3 users have very good chances at getting winning the minor drops, since a good many players of Manetheren have a full set already. Also we have a slayer-list as a means of distributing the leader's spare drop (I don't keep any of them for myself) and a fair competition that regulates the distribution of Demon Spirits.

*We are doing hard Zombja maps within 3 days or less and you get 5 Z-rewards for participating in a map.

*We are among the game's official Top 10 villages nearly every day.

*We have Science 4 active every time a player requests it.

Now here is what this is about:

5 of my players have suddenly stopped playing and I have open spots to be filled. Everyone is welcome! I do not care whether you are a strong veteran of Billy, or new to the game and inexperienced.
The only 3 things I care about are 1) that you do your village actions every day, 2) that you are sure you want to keep on playing BvS for some time at least, and 3) that you are not talking rude or in a 'lol ur haz mine noze'-kind of way; it hurts my eyes to read that kind of language.

Now, if you are looking for a good village with a nice and helpful community, please apply to Manetheren and I'll let you in ASAP.

Hope to see you soon^^
